title: JAM / PALEDRIVER
description: A small, old, shrivelled up mesque woman with thinning hair sits awkwardly on the ledge of a lorry. An empty, glazed look adorns her eyes. She murmurs while nodding her head to the music coming from a radio in her lorry cabin. She wears a squared truck-driver flannel shirt with sleeves wrapped up to her elbows and blue denim dungarees tucked in yellow-brown (Caterpillar) boots.

dialogueTree.title: Paledriver: "The woman looks at nothing, her eye..."
dialogueTree.text: The woman looks at nothing, her eyes closed and her lips moving.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""Girl child," you hear her say. "Gi..."
links.text: "Girl child," you hear her say. "Girl child. Girl child..."

dialogueTree.title: Paledriver: ""Lawman," she greets you. "You caug..."
dialogueTree.text: "Lawman," she greets you. "You caught me at an opportune moment. This awful weather keeps me awake. You can entertain me with your questions."

links.title: You: ""What are you hauling?""
links.text: "What are you hauling?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Diamonds.""
links.text: "Diamonds."

links.title: You: ""Diamonds, really?""
links.text: "Diamonds, really?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Of course not," she says, grinning..."
links.text: "Of course not," she says, grinning. "But wouldn't it be marvellous if I was?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, but what are you *really* ha..."
links.text: "Okay, but what are you *really* hauling?"

links.title: Paledriver: "She shrugs. "Whatever stupid things..."
links.text: She shrugs. "Whatever stupid things they put in the lorry, I imagine."

links.title: You: ""So you don't know what you're haul..."
links.text: "So you don't know what you're hauling in your own lorry?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""I quit concerning myself with that..."
links.text: "I quit concerning myself with that a long time ago." She smiles a careless smile. "Besides, I don't drive the lorry for the cargo, if you know what I mean..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "She says that as if something *narc..."
links.text: She says that as if something *narcotic* is the real reason.

links.title: You: ""Wait -- you get high off driving a..."
links.text: "Wait -- you get high off driving a lorry?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Oh, it's so much more than *high*..."
links.text: "Oh, it's so much more than *high* where I go, xerife. It's *low* -- I go to the bottom..." She closes her eyes in reverie.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Yeah, it's definitely some kick. So..."
links.text: Yeah, it's definitely some kick. Some *terrible* kick... the pale probably. This 'pale' sounds like it's the *shit*.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Yeah, it's definitely some kick, so..."
links.text: Yeah, it's definitely some kick, some *terrible* kick in the dark. A sleep kick. Perhaps you can find out later...

links.title: You: ""What if the cargo is contraband?""
links.text: "What if the cargo is contraband?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Then it's contraband, lawman. What..."
links.text: "Then it's contraband, lawman. What? Do you want to take an old woman in? Be my guest. Lock me away like Bad Hand Hermenegildo."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Bad Hand Hermenegildo's *bad* hand..."
links.text: Bad Hand Hermenegildo's *bad* hand strangled three hundred people. What can I say -- some people just really like strangling people.

links.title: You: ""I guess that makes sense. Minding..."
links.text: "I guess that makes sense. Minding your own business."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Of course it does -- what did you..."
links.text: "Of course it does -- what did you expect?"

links.title: You: ""I don't think I *do* know what you..."
links.text: "I don't think I *do* know what you mean."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Of course you don't.""
links.text: "Of course you don't."

links.title: You: ""Well, that's good enough for me.""
links.text: "Well, that's good enough for me."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Is that all you wanted to know, la..."
links.text: "Is that all you wanted to know, lawman?"

links.title: You: ""I still don't really understand th..."
links.text: "I still don't really understand this whole *boiadeiro* thing."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Of course not. To truly understand..."
links.text: "Of course not. To truly understand the boiadeiro, you need to listen to 'On the Western Plain'."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A *boiadeiro* (*boia* for short) is..."
links.text: A *boiadeiro* (*boia* for short) is a cow herder from upstream Magritte, the great steppes of Northern Mesque. People like Ma√±ana, at the gates, have turned it into an ideology of sorts.

links.title: You: ""Okay. What's that?""
links.text: "Okay. What's that?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""It's an old ballad about a young g..."
links.text: "It's an old ballad about a young girl who falls in love with a daring boiadeiro. He promises to marry her as soon as he returns from the Western Plain."

links.title: You: ""I'm guessing that doesn't happen.""
links.text: "I'm guessing that doesn't happen."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Of course not. The boiadeiro retur..."
links.text: "Of course not. The boiadeiro returns from the Western Plain a *changed* man. One night, as he and his beloved are out walking along the River Magritte, she pleads with him to give up his riding and settle down..."

links.title: Drama: "In the background you can hear the..."
links.text: In the background you can hear the orchestra swell as the screen fills with the maiden's imploring eyes...

links.title: You: ""I think I see where this is going.""
links.text: "I think I see where this is going."

links.title: Paledriver: ""So the boiadeiro strangles his bel..."
links.text: "So the boiadeiro strangles his beloved and throws her body in the Magritte. Then he rides off, because the Western Plain is calling to him."

links.title: You: ""That's... not where I thought that..."
links.text: "That's... not where I thought that was going."

links.title: Paledriver: ""You have to understand -- a true b..."
links.text: "You have to understand -- a true boiadeiro needs a whole horizon to himself. He can't be tied down by man or woman. His beloved was selfish. She didn't know what it meant to love a *boiadeiro*."

links.title: Inland Empire: "What if... to truly love a boiadeir..."
links.text: What if... to truly love a boiadeiro is to float lifeless downstream?

links.title: You: "(Nod solemnly.) "A beautiful song.""
links.text: (Nod solemnly.) "A beautiful song."

links.title: Paledriver: ""The *most* beautiful -- a true boi..."
links.text: "The *most* beautiful -- a true boiadeiro needs a whole horizon to himself. He can't be tied down by man or woman. His beloved was selfish. She didn't know what it meant to love a *boiadeiro*."

links.title: You: ""That's a terrible song.""
links.text: "That's a terrible song."

links.title: You: ""So he gives up his riding and sett..."
links.text: "So he gives up his riding and settles down, right?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""No, the boiadeiro strangles his be..."
links.text: "No, the boiadeiro strangles his beloved and throws her body in the Magritte. Then he rides off, because the Western Plain is calling to him."

links.title: You: ""And they live happily ever after?""
links.text: "And they live happily ever after?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Don't be stupid. The boiadeiro ret..."
links.text: "Don't be stupid. The boiadeiro returns from the Western Plain a *changed* man. One night, as he and his beloved are out walking along the River Magritte, she pleads with him to give up his riding and settle down..."

links.title: You: ""I've already got too many records..."
links.text: "I've already got too many records to listen to as it is. Change of topic."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A *boiadeiro* (*boia* for short) is..."
links.text: A *boiadeiro* (*boia* for short) is a cow herder from upstream Magritte, the great steppes of Northern Mesque. He is a rugged individualist and explorer.

links.title: You: ""I'm looking for Ruby, the *lady dr..."
links.text: "I'm looking for Ruby, the *lady driver*. Know anything about her?"

links.title: Paledriver: "She cups her ear and leans forward...."
links.text: She cups her ear and leans forward. "Did you just call me a *lady*, xerife?"

links.title: Suggestion: "If you want to know more about Ruby..."
links.text: If you want to know more about Ruby, this is a dead end. She's only heard the word 'lady' and latched onto it. You can push on if you're interested in *that*, though.

links.title: You: ""Well, aren't you a lady?""
links.text: "Well, aren't you a lady?"

links.title: Paledriver: "The woman's malevolent cackling fil..."
links.text: The woman's malevolent cackling fills the roundabout.

links.title: Paledriver: ""I'm a lady like you're Gabriel Bue..."
links.text: "I'm a lady like you're Gabriel Buenguerro -- only in dreams."

links.title: Paledriver: ""I'm terrifying to small children...."
links.text: "I'm terrifying to small children. And to those who used to know me."

links.title: You: ""Never mind. I have other questions.""
links.text: "Never mind. I have other questions."

links.title: You: ""Alright. Are you *the* lady driver?""
links.text: "Alright. Are you *the* lady driver?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Did you just call me a *lady*, xer..."
links.text: "Did you just call me a *lady*, xerife?"

links.title: Suggestion: "She clearly doesn't think she's a '..."
links.text: She clearly doesn't think she's a 'lady'. Don't repeat it.

links.title: You: ""I was told of a woman driver. You'..."
links.text: "I was told of a woman driver. You're the only woman here."

links.title: Paledriver: ""I'm not that either, *xerife*." He..."
links.text: "I'm not that either, *xerife*." Her smile dissipates. "I've gone too far from it all to remember what was between my legs. It doesn't work like that on the *long haul*."

links.title: You: ""So... you're *not* the driver ever..."
links.text: "So... you're *not* the driver everyone is terrified of?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""I'm only terrifying to small child..."
links.text: "I'm only terrifying to small children. And to those who used to know me."

links.title: Drama: "Yeah... it's not her. Believe me."
links.text: Yeah... it's not her. Believe me.

links.title: You: ""Why are you scary to the people wh..."
links.text: "Why are you scary to the people who used to know you?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Because they can no longer recogni..."
links.text: "Because they can no longer recognize the person I once was."

links.title: You: ""You said *long* haul. That's...""
links.text: "You said *long* haul. That's..."

links.title: Paledriver: ""The big ones. The tracts. There's..."
links.text: "The big ones. The tracts. There's no women and men there, it's all just..." She hums along, as if to a track on repeat...

links.title: Paledriver: ""'In the middle of this town there'..."
links.text: "'In the middle of this town there's a ghostly motorway -- it takes all the people where they want to stay'..."

links.title: Shivers: "You feel very cold suddenly. As if..."
links.text: You feel very cold suddenly. As if standing face to face with a terrifying adversary. Then the feeling dissipates and all you see is an ageing woman.

links.title: Conceptualization: "In the background, a quiet song see..."
links.text: In the background, a quiet song seeps from her cabin into the air. You don't hear any vocals.

links.title: You: ""Then who is the female driver I wa..."
links.text: "Then who is the female driver I was told of?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""How should I know? Do I look like..."
links.text: "How should I know? Do I look like I spend a lot of time with the other camionneurs -- sniffing around -- when I have my movies to go to..."

links.title: You: ""That's all I needed to know, thank..."
links.text: "That's all I needed to know, thanks." (Conclude.)

links.title: Paledriver: ""*O sim*..." The woman stares at yo..."
links.text: "*O sim*..." The woman stares at you, her mind elsewhere now, on other matters.

links.title: Volition: "Something in her is pulling toward..."
links.text: Something in her is pulling toward some unknown rest state. She twitches -- like a sleep kick.

links.title: You: ""Before I came, you seemed... *away..."
links.text: "Before I came, you seemed... *away*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She's just a distracted old woman...."
links.text: "She's just a distracted old woman. We should maybe let her get back to her things..."

links.title: Logic: "So he doesn't think she's the lady..."
links.text: So he doesn't think she's the lady driver?

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "C'mon, he thinks -- she's not the l..."
links.text: C'mon, he thinks -- she's not the lady driver.

links.title: Logic: "So he doesn't think she's the smugg..."
links.text: So he doesn't think she's the smuggler?

links.title: Paledriver: ""You hear that, lawman? I don't thi..."
links.text: "You hear that, lawman? I don't think your partner likes you spending too much time with me..."

links.title: Paledriver: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: You: ""You were in a dream. Inactive. Tun..."
links.text: "You were in a dream. Inactive. Tuned off."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Yes. What about it?""
links.text: "Yes. What about it?"

links.title: You: ""Wait -- why is that, lieutenant?""
links.text: "Wait -- why is that, lieutenant?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing. I just don't think she's..."
links.text: "Nothing. I just don't think she's connected to anything."

links.title: Drama: "It's because of the pale. He doesn'..."
links.text: It's because of the pale. He doesn't want your frail mind caught up in it -- and this woman has spent time *in* the pale. A lot of time.

links.title: Endurance: "Whatever it is about this woman, it..."
links.text: Whatever it is about this woman, it's connected to *time* -- she knows the way back.

links.title: Drama: "He doesn't want your frail mind cau..."
links.text: He doesn't want your frail mind caught up in something here. Something *unconnected* to the case. But connected to this woman tuning out like that.

links.title: Empathy: "He's worried. But not for her -- fo..."
links.text: He's worried. But not for her -- for you. Hmm. What is it about this woman, if she's not connected to anything?

links.title: You: ""Should you drive a lorry if you ge..."
links.text: "Should you drive a lorry if you get like that?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Oh, don't worry about me. I'm one..."
links.text: "Oh, don't worry about me. I'm one of the best camionneurs around. I drive routes no one else will."

links.title: You: ""The routes you drive are *unusual*..."
links.text: "The routes you drive are *unusual*, aren't they."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Some of them. Some of them are lik..."
links.text: "Some of them. Some of them are like home to me now." She nods. "I would say the routes I drive are *usual* to me."

links.title: You: ""Okay -- let's change the subject.""
links.text: "Okay -- let's change the subject."

links.title: Paledriver: ""A pale dream, is what it is." She..."
links.text: "A pale dream, is what it is." She nods her head according to a rhythm known only to her -- staring at the photo in her hands.

links.title: You: ""Blacked out. Should you be driving..."
links.text: "Blacked out. Should you be driving a lorry if you get like that?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Because I'm one of the best camion..."
links.text: "Because I'm one of the best camionneurs around, that's why. I drive routes no one else will."

links.title: You: ""What routes?""
links.text: "What routes?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Lomonossov's Land. Udachnaya Zemly..."
links.text: "Lomonossov's Land. Udachnaya Zemlya. The Western Plain..." She nods and closes her eyes again, letting her mind submerge...

links.title: Shivers: "A terrible cold comes over her. Rat..."
links.text: A terrible cold comes over her. Rattling her teeth, as she stares inward.

links.title: Paledriver: ""The Trans-Katla Magistral. U41-A...."
links.text: "The Trans-Katla Magistral. U41-A. As Estradas do Mirador. All the good ones. The deep trenches. Where the bluebirds fly." She opens her eyes again and shudders.

links.title: You: ""I'm something of an expert in blac..."
links.text: "I'm something of an expert in blacking out. You should take better care of yourself."

links.title: Paledriver: "She looks you over and scoffs. "You..."
links.text: She looks you over and scoffs. "You're right, lawman. *I'm* the one who should take *my* health more seriously. Thank you for looking out for me..."

links.title: Endurance: "A correct appraisal, you're quite s..."
links.text: A correct appraisal, you're quite shabby.

links.title: You: ""This should be reported to the pro..."
links.text: "This should be reported to the proper authorities."

links.title: Paledriver: ""You go right ahead, lawman. Let me..."
links.text: "You go right ahead, lawman. Let me know when you find them. I can't wait to read their *report*..."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Is that all you woke me up to say?""
links.text: "Is that all you woke me up to say?"

links.title: You: ""Cool. Ride until you're dust, sist..."
links.text: "Cool. Ride until you're dust, sister."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Irm√£o..." she breathes out. "I alr..."
links.text: "Irm√£o..." she breathes out. "I already *am* dust."

links.title: You: ""I think I know what's going on wit..."
links.text: "I think I know what's going on with you."

links.title: Paledriver: ""And what *is* that?" She sticks a..."
links.text: "And what *is* that?" She sticks a filterless cigarette into a cigarette holder and reaches for the light.

links.title: You: ""You're a paledriver. You transport..."
links.text: "You're a paledriver. You transport goods through the pale."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great." The lieutenant concedes wi..."
links.text: "Great." The lieutenant concedes with a head shake. "He's figured out the pale. And now he's talking to everyone about it..."

links.title: You: ""Actually, I haven't figured anythi..."
links.text: "Actually, I haven't figured anything out yet..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You haven't? Why are you bringing..."
links.text: "You haven't? Why are you bringing up *pale* then?"

links.title: You: ""This is about turning *back* time,..."
links.text: "This is about turning *back* time, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're still on this ridiculous *si..."
links.text: "We're still on this ridiculous *side-task*, I see..." He sighs and turns to the woman. "Ma'am, my partner wanted to know if you work in pale transport."

links.title: Paledriver: ""No offence, but *your partner*..."..."
links.text: "No offence, but *your partner*..." She lights the cigarette, a white and silver cloud of smoke disappears into her mouth.

links.title: Paledriver: ""...seems like a bit of an idiot."..."
links.text: "...seems like a bit of an idiot." She breathes out. The air tastes sweet.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great." The lieutenant concedes wi..."
links.text: "Great." The lieutenant concedes with a head shake. "He asked the Pines rep about the pale."

links.title: You: ""You don't have to protect me from..."
links.text: "You don't have to protect me from this. I'm a big boy."

links.title: You: ""I can't operate in this world with..."
links.text: "I can't operate in this world without knowing its basic terms."

links.title: You: ""I'm a detective. I need to know th..."
links.text: "I'm a detective. I need to know things."

links.title: You: ""No. I just remembered it myself."..."
links.text: "No. I just remembered it myself." (Point to your head.) "With my head."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine." He's not buying it. "Just t..."
links.text: "Fine." He's not buying it. "Just try not to black out again. And don't *contemplate*. We don't have time for that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great." The lieutenant concedes wi..."
links.text: "Great." The lieutenant concedes with a head shake. "He asked the Pines rep about the pale -- and now he's talking to everyone about it..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine, then." He sighs. "Just try n..."
links.text: "Fine, then." He sighs. "Just try not to black out again. And don't *contemplate*. We don't have time for that."

links.title: Conceptualization: "It's death -- but for the Universe?..."
links.text: It's death -- but for the Universe? Oh, we're contemplating the living *shit* out of this.

links.title: You: ""Oh -- I'm contemplating, Kim. I'm..."
links.text: "Oh -- I'm contemplating, Kim. I'm drawing *existential conclusions* from this."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Exactly* what I didn't want you t..."
links.text: "*Exactly* what I didn't want you to do..." He sighs and turns to the woman. "Ma'am, my partner wanted to know if you work in pale transport."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, no. Just for detective work...."
links.text: "Yeah, no. Just for detective work. That's all I needed it for. Now..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is *exactly* what I didn't wa..."
links.text: "That is *exactly* what I didn't want you to do..." He sighs and turns to the woman. "Ma'am, my partner wanted to know if you work in pale transport."

links.title: You: ""Everything is related to the pale...."
links.text: "Everything is related to the pale. My condition. The case. Everything. It's all *entroponetic*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is *exactly* what I didn't wa..."
links.text: "That is *exactly* what I didn't want you to think..." He sighs and turns to the woman. "Ma'am, my partner wanted to know if you work in pale transport."

links.title: Paledriver: ""*Oh meu deus*, the Lawman solved t..."
links.text: "*Oh meu deus*, the Lawman solved the case..." She lights the cigarette. A white cloud of smoke disappears into her mouth.

links.title: Paledriver: ""And here I was thinking you were a..."
links.text: "And here I was thinking you were an idiot." She breathes out and the air tastes sweet. "So, are you? An idiot, I mean."

links.title: Perception (Smell): "'Rep√∫blica', a filterless cigarette..."
links.text: 'Rep√∫blica', a filterless cigarette from Mesque.

links.title: You: ""'Rep√∫blica'." (Smell the air.) "Th..."
links.text: "'Rep√∫blica'." (Smell the air.) "That's not very healthy."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Neither is pale transportation." S..."
links.text: "Neither is pale transportation." She shrugs. "Life is transitory."

links.title: You: ""I blacked out after a night of hea..."
links.text: "I blacked out after a night of heavy drinking and lost all memory of the world."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Like Gabriel Buenguerro in 'Pergun..."
links.text: "Like Gabriel Buenguerro in 'Pergunte √† Poeira.'" She nods and smiles, unkindly. "You're the opposite of me, then. I remember everything -- even things I never knew."

links.title: You: ""Things you never knew?""
links.text: "Things you never knew?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""The smell of liquor on Gabriel's l..."
links.text: "The smell of liquor on Gabriel's lips after the shoot. In the motor park. The roses on the day of Franconegro's coronation. On the grand stairs of Raehl. The smoke from the fowling piece, when Dolores Dei was shot..."

links.title: Endurance: "Yes, *yes*. This is what you've bee..."
links.text: Yes, *yes*. This is what you've been searching for...

links.title: Paledriver: ""The look on her face -- like an or..."
links.text: "The look on her face -- like an orgasm. The wound in her chest. My hand in my father's hand..." She closes her eyes, her eyelids trembling. "Except I never had a father. And I never shot Her Innocence Dolores Dei."

links.title: You: ""Over-radiation?""
links.text: "Over-radiation?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Heroic doses, *xerife*. Heroic.""
links.text: "Heroic doses, *xerife*. Heroic."

links.title: You: ""It sounds... *wonderful*.""
links.text: "It sounds... *wonderful*."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Thought insertion? *Dithering*? Th..."
links.text: "Thought insertion? *Dithering*? The Graad-Katla Magistral?" She savours the lungful. "There's a kind of wonder there -- a *sad* wonder. But... at first I had to make a living. Now..."

links.title: Paledriver: ""When you've seen it all go *away*..."
links.text: "When you've seen it all go *away* like that. Rolling off like the sea. And then come back to this..." She gestures at the square: the broken horse monument, the shadows of the machines in the night.

links.title: Paledriver: ""What are we *doing* here? For thou..."
links.text: "What are we *doing* here? For thousands of years, Gabriel... It doesn't have to be like this. We can just give up. We can just become vapour."

links.title: You: ""What does it look like? The pale?""
links.text: "What does it look like? The pale?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Like looking into the ocean at nig..."
links.text: "Like looking into the ocean at night. In the dark."

links.title: You: ""And...""
Paledriver: ""You cannot see it but you know it'..."
links.text: "You cannot see it but you know it's there. And it's big -- bigger than anything. Bigger than all the other things combined."

links.title: You: ""What does it feel like?""
links.text: "What does it feel like?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Nothing. Until it starts. When you..."
links.text: "Nothing. Until it starts. When you're deep enough -- then, for me... it's like autumn. Dark grey and orange, the orange of streetlights and the colour of trees in the electric light. It smells like autumn too. It smells terrible."

links.title: Empathy: "Nostalgia. Cooped up in the cabin,..."
links.text: Nostalgia. Cooped up in the cabin, shaking... Terrible nostalgia. For yourself. For humans. It's too much to bear. She loves it.

links.title: You: ""What *is* it?""
links.text: "What *is* it?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Beautiful... it's beautiful.""
links.text: "Beautiful... it's beautiful."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "That's the most you can get out of..."
links.text: That's the most you can get out of her -- only shapes and sensations, no dictionary definitions or scientific explanations...

links.title: You: ""How do you pass through it?""
links.text: "How do you pass through it?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""In the belly of an airship, behind..."
links.text: "In the belly of an airship, behind steel windows -- so you don't look straight into it. It's not *advised* to look into it."

links.title: You: ""Not on this lorry then?""
links.text: "Not on this lorry then?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""No -- the same one. A *roller*. Th..."
links.text: "No -- the same one. A *roller*. They all are nowadays. Special wheels for connecting to the floor of the hold." She points to the machines, clumped up like toys.

links.title: Interfacing: "Their wheels all small and round, m..."
links.text: Their wheels all small and round, multi-axle trailers.

links.title: You: ""One last thing. You said we can ju..."
links.text: "One last thing. You said we can just become... vapour?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Rhetoric: "No elaboration."
links.text: No elaboration.

links.title: Endurance: "This is your chance. Ask her, is it..."
links.text: This is your chance. Ask her, is it really possible?

links.title: You: ""Hold on, you said it *was* possibl..."
links.text: "Hold on, you said it *was* possible to turn back time, through the pale..."

links.title: Paledriver: ""*Xerife*, what you understand woul..."
links.text: "*Xerife*, what you understand wouldn't fill a pamphlet..."

links.title: Paledriver: ""You don't need to turn back time...."
links.text: "You don't need to turn back time. The pale is already churning with it. As the tide of pale rises, so does the past. Someday both will cover the whole world. That's it. That's the story."

links.title: You: ""You're saying the future will *be*..."
links.text: "You're saying the future will *be* the past..."

links.title: Paledriver: ""And that's just fine with me. I do..."
links.text: "And that's just fine with me. I don't mind becoming vapour. I *like* vapour..." She gathers a cloud of smoke in her mouth, then slowly exhales.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "There is a name for this ideology:..."
links.text: There is a name for this ideology: Entropolism. A faith in and desire to accelerate the spread of pale across the world, until humanity has reached what its adherents call the 'rest state' of humanity, the final reconciliation of past, present, and future in timeless spirit...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You don't like the sound of that, c..."
links.text: You don't like the sound of that, chief. All the *really* good stuff is *right here*, in the present...

links.title: You: ""You mean, we'll all be drowned in..."
links.text: "You mean, we'll all be drowned in our own past..."

links.title: You: ""You're saying, one day I'll be abl..."
links.text: "You're saying, one day I'll be able to return to *love*..."

links.title: Paledriver: ""If you wait long enough, it's goin..."
links.text: "If you wait long enough, it's going to be much more than just 'love'... It's going to be the entire history -- vapourised."

links.title: You: ""I would rather have what I have th..."
links.text: "I would rather have what I have than what you have."

links.title: Paledriver: ""They say there is a point -- one t..."
links.text: "They say there is a point -- one that *I* have not crossed -- in the pale superdeep. If you stray too far off course on the U41-A, or in Lomonossov's Land... where every step you take is one step further from home, no matter the direction."

links.title: Paledriver: ""It's a point you cannot come back..."
links.text: "It's a point you cannot come back from. Your mind becomes so radiant with the past -- there is a flip." She flicks the ash from her cigarette. "Instead of writing, it erases memory. Nearing some kind of..." She shakes her head. "Indescribable *finale*."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Maybe you've been down the *Motorw..."
links.text: "Maybe you've been down the *Motorway South?*" She looks at her cigarette, it's almost out. She has swallowed it hungrily. Then at you...

links.title: You: ""The Motorway South?""
links.text: "The Motorway South?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""It's a story us longhaulsmen tell..."
links.text: "It's a story us longhaulsmen tell -- longhaulsmen, *xerife*, not *paledrivers* -- way beyond the established pale that's lit by radio frequencies. Where it goes silent."

links.title: Paledriver: ""And dark. And the process begins...."
links.text: "And dark. And the process begins. Erasure. Kilometre by kilometre. In any direction. The Motorway South is a road you cannot come back from."

links.title: Conceptualization: "'In the centre of this town there's..."
links.text: 'In the centre of this town there's a ghostly motorway', she sang.

links.title: You: ""'It takes all the people where the..."
links.text: "'It takes all the people where they want to stay.'"

links.title: Paledriver: ""'They say I've been away on a kind..."
links.text: "'They say I've been away on a kind of holiday'..." She replies, silently.

links.title: You: ""What is at the end of the Motorway..."
links.text: "What is at the end of the Motorway South?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""No one knows what's at the *end......"
links.text: "No one knows what's at the *end...*" She takes the cigarette out of the cigarette holder and extinguishes it. "I've only glimpsed the beginning."

links.title: Paledriver: ""I've only felt it in the distance...."
links.text: "I've only felt it in the distance. When I was a child..." She goes silent, her eyes close and her hands shake. "A child. Rowing on the lake."

links.title: You: ""Ma'am?""
links.text: "Ma'am?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""*Hosiannna...*" A sigh escapes her..."
links.text: "*Hosiannna...*" A sigh escapes her lips, then silence, as she stares within herself.

links.title: Empathy: "There is nothing more to do now. Sh..."
links.text: There is nothing more to do now. She's far away.

links.title: Conceptualization: "She is receding. In the clutches of..."
links.text: She is receding. In the clutches of some indescribable, scattered emotion. A child. Descending.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've fried both your brains enou..."
links.text: "You've fried both your brains enough for today, detective..." He inspects her. No response.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, I'd like to have a word with..."
links.text: "Now, I'd like to have a word with you about this *side task* of yours..."

links.title: Endurance: "This is all you're going to get out..."
links.text: This is all you're going to get out of her. There's nothing more for you here.

links.title: Endurance: "But there *is* one more kingsman to..."
links.text: But there *is* one more kingsman to confront.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've fried both your brains enou..."
links.text: "You've fried both your brains enough for today, detective..." He inspects her. No response.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's get some air. This one's far..."
links.text: "Let's get some air. This one's far gone..." He shakes his head silently as he turns to leave.

links.title: You: ""Thank you. Good bye." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Thank you. Good bye." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Just a moment, detective. Before w..."
links.text: "Just a moment, detective. Before we go, I'd like a word with you about this *side task* of yours..."

links.title: You: ""I feel like I'm getting *really* c..."
links.text: "I feel like I'm getting *really* close."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've been saying that for a whil..."
links.text: "You've been saying that for a while. And yet, we only seem to be getting *further* from our actual goal..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Because the problem isn't time, it..."
links.text: "Because the problem isn't time, it's *you*, detective..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you're serious about this, real..."
links.text: "If you're serious about this, really truly serious, then I suggest you take a long, hard look in the mirror and ask yourself what's *really* going on..."

links.title: Endurance: "The lieutenant is right. It's the o..."
links.text: The lieutenant is right. It's the only way forward. Face yourself, kingsman!

links.title: You: ""I feel like there's still a *long..."
links.text: "I feel like there's still a *long way* to go."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. You see, we've already spent t..."
links.text: "No. You see, we've already spent too much time on this nonsensical side-errand. There's no magical fascist who's going to unwind time for you..."

links.title: Endurance: "Stop. There's nothing else she can..."
links.text: Stop. There's nothing else she can do for you, but this isn't the end of the line. No, there's one more kingsman to confront.

links.title: You: "Who?"
links.text: Who?

links.title: Endurance: "*YOU*."
links.text: *YOU*.

links.title: Endurance: "It's time to face yourself, mano y..."
links.text: It's time to face yourself, mano y mano. The next time you find yourself alone before a mirror. *That's* where this will end... The final showdown.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Why don't you ever listen to us. We..."
links.text: Why don't you ever listen to us. We tried to warn you that you wouldn't *like* what the mirror had to say...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Are you s-s-sure you want to do tha..."
links.text: Are you s-s-sure you want to do that? Remember what happened *last* time...

links.title: Inland Empire: "B-b-but what if you don't *like* wh..."
links.text: B-b-but what if you don't *like* what you find there? There'll be no going back from it...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now come on, let's leave this one..."
links.text: "Now come on, let's leave this one to her reveries." He shakes his head silently as he turns to leave.

links.title: You: ""I would rather have what you have..."
links.text: "I would rather have what you have than what I have."

links.title: You: ""I feel I already *have* what you h..."
links.text: "I feel I already *have* what you have. In some way."

links.title: Paledriver: ""When you've seen it all go *away*..."
links.text: "When you've seen it all go *away* like that, rolling off like the sea, and then come back to this..." She gestures at the square. The broken horse monument, the clanging of machines in the distance.

links.title: You: ""Isn't that dangerous?""
links.text: "Isn't that dangerous?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Thought insertion? *Dithering*? Th..."
links.text: "Thought insertion? *Dithering*? The Graad-Katla Magistral?" She savours the lungful. "It's more than dangerous -- it's *sad*. But... at first I had to make a living. Now..."

links.title: You: ""I blacked out -- from sheer heartb..."
links.text: "I blacked out -- from sheer heartbreak -- and lost all memory of the world."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Like Gabriel Buenguerro in 'Segure..."
links.text: "Like Gabriel Buenguerro in 'Segure-me, Para√≠so'..." She nods and smiles, unkindly. "You're the opposite of me then. I remember everything -- even the things I never knew."

links.title: You: ""I'm not an idiot. I'm a detective..."
links.text: "I'm not an idiot. I'm a detective of the RCM. Don't say I'm an idiot."

links.title: Paledriver: ""You *are* an idiot. And you're kee..."
links.text: "You *are* an idiot. And you're keeping me here. Glued to this racket. Unless there was anything else..." She puts the cigarette out and stares at something in the distance.

links.title: Endurance: "No-no-no... you'll never figure out..."
links.text: No-no-no... you'll never figure out how to turn back time if you're not honest with her. Explain what's going on with you.

links.title: You: ""I blacked out -- from the love I f..."
links.text: "I blacked out -- from the love I felt for my Motherland -- and lost all memory of the world."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Like Gabriel Buenguerro in 'O C√©u..."
links.text: "Like Gabriel Buenguerro in 'O C√©u Dourado'..." She nods and smiles, unkindly. "You're the opposite of me then. I remember everything -- even the things I never knew."

links.title: You: ""Nothing. No need to be direct.""
links.text: "Nothing. No need to be direct."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Some jamboree you turned out to be..."
links.text: "Some jamboree you turned out to be... You have about a third of the jawline of Gabriel Buenguerro, and none of the balls." She smiles.

links.title: Endurance: "What are you doing? This woman migh..."
links.text: What are you doing? This woman might be your only chance to figure out how to reverse time... Grow a pair!

links.title: You: ""Show me the soles of your boots.""
links.text: "Show me the soles of your boots."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Now what do you want with an old w..."
links.text: "Now what do you want with an old woman's boots, *xerife*?"

links.title: You: ""It's for important police business..."
links.text: "It's for important police business, ma'am."

links.title: Paledriver: "She raises her boot, slowly -- with..."
links.text: She raises her boot, slowly -- with contempt -- and says. "I'm starting to think you should let me get back to Gabriel Buenguerro. You're no Gabriel..."

links.title: Paledriver: "She's wearing sturdy worker's boots..."
links.text: She's wearing sturdy worker's boots made of black leather. Buckles run across. The sole is also made of leather.

links.title: You: ""Now the other one please.""
links.text: "Now the other one please."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Just before Gabriel it was the cor..."
links.text: "Just before Gabriel it was the coronation of Franconegro -- now *there* was a real man..." There is no aberration in the pattern that you can see. She puts her foot down.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Moreover, the boots were size 37. T..."
links.text: Moreover, the boots were size 37. Tiny. There are too many discrepancies in all this.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Another discrepancy, although not b..."
links.text: Another discrepancy, although not boot-related, is the coronation of His Innocence Franconegro. Which happened 500 years ago.

links.title: You: ""Wait, what do you mean it *was* th..."
links.text: "Wait, what do you mean it *was* the coronation of Franconegro?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""It was," she shrugs. "And then it..."
links.text: "It was," she shrugs. "And then it was no more. And I was no longer holding my father's hand. He was no longer descending the stairs in Raehl. The crowd had gone silent."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Perhaps it was another *xerife* wh..."
links.text: "Perhaps it was another *xerife* who came and woke me up, looking at my boots, asking questions? Or perhaps it was one of the others in this *carnaval*. I don't remember."

links.title: Composure: "As she says *carnaval* she gestures..."
links.text: As she says *carnaval* she gestures to the empty square -- with the statue and the machines.

links.title: You: "(Turn to Kim.) "She is not Odd Sole..."
links.text: (Turn to Kim.) "She is not Odd Sole. These are not the boots that made the prints."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He takes a quick note. "I could hav..."
links.text: He takes a quick note. "I could have told you that from just looking at them. Her size is 37."

links.title: Paledriver: ""The feet of a little girl," she sm..."
links.text: "The feet of a little girl," she smiles. "They fit well on the pedals."

links.title: You: ""These are not the boots I was look..."
links.text: "These are not the boots I was looking for."

links.title: Paledriver: ""The feet of a little girl," she sm..."
links.text: "The feet of a little girl," she smiles. "They fit well on the pedals.

links.title: You: ""Please? Help me out here. It's imp..."
links.text: "Please? Help me out here. It's important."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Please?" She raises her boot, slow..."
links.text: "Please?" She raises her boot, slowly, with contempt. "I think you should let me get back to Gabriel Buenguerro. You're no Gabriel. Gabriel doesn't say please..."

links.title: You: ""Nothing, I guess. Let's talk about..."
links.text: "Nothing, I guess. Let's talk about something else."

links.title: Paledriver: "The woman sways her wrinkled shell..."
links.text: The woman sways her wrinkled shell back and forth, a strange grin across her face.

links.title: You: ""You seem like a woman who knows a..."
links.text: "You seem like a woman who knows a thing or two about drugs."

links.title: Paledriver: ""What do I need drugs for, lawman?..."
links.text: "What do I need drugs for, lawman? What I see, what I *feel*, the Great Adversary... no drugs can compare."

links.title: You: ""The... Adversary?""
links.text: "The... Adversary?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Yes. There is a *protagonista*..."..."
links.text: "Yes. There is a *protagonista*..." She gestures to the intersection. "And an *advers√°rio*. I am on the side of the Adversary. There's no coming back from that haul."

links.title: Conceptualization: "The pale. Sounds like *the* drug to..."
links.text: The pale. Sounds like *the* drug to me.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Those epithets are familiar somehow..."
links.text: Those epithets are familiar somehow -- The Great Adversary, The Great Unrest.

links.title: Half Light: "I don't like the sound of any of th..."
links.text: I don't like the sound of any of that. Sounds like a horrible drug. The worst one of them all.

links.title: You: ""Because of all those hauls through..."
links.text: "Because of all those hauls through the pale?"

links.title: Paledriver: "She glares at you. "Oh, this *xerif..."
links.text: She glares at you. "Oh, this *xerife* is a smart one."

links.title: Logic: "She doesn't actually think you're t..."
links.text: She doesn't actually think you're that smart.

links.title: Drama: "Maybe if she thought you're... *cor..."
links.text: Maybe if she thought you're... *corrupt*?

links.title: You: ""Evrart sent me." (Place finger on..."
links.text: "Evrart sent me." (Place finger on the side of your nose and tap twice.)

links.title: Paledriver: ""Who the fuck is Evrart?""
links.text: "Who the fuck is Evrart?"

links.title: You: ""The Union boss?""
links.text: "The Union boss?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""*Ah*. And what do I care about the..."
links.text: "*Ah*. And what do I care about the Union boss? He's not Gabriel, he's not Franconegro. He's not even Hermenegildo the Hand."

links.title: You: ""What is it that you're hauling, ex..."
links.text: "What is it that you're hauling, exactly?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Your *m√£e*, lawman. What of it?""
links.text: "Your *m√£e*, lawman. What of it?"

links.title: You: ""Okay. Let me put this another way..."
links.text: "Okay. Let me put this another way -- are you smuggling drugs through Terminal B?"

links.title: Paledriver: "Her shoulder bones crack as she shr..."
links.text: Her shoulder bones crack as she shrugs. "Maybe. Probably not. Makes no difference to me either way."

links.title: You: ""You said earlier you don't know wh..."
links.text: "You said earlier you don't know what cargo you're hauling. Could it be drugs?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Just this month I made half a doze..."
links.text: "Just this month I made half a dozen trips from Saramiriza to Graad, on the U41-A. What do you think they take from Saramiriza to Graad, lawman?"

links.title: You: ""Drugs!?""
links.text: "Drugs!?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""No, lawman. Diamonds." She grins."
links.text: "No, lawman. Diamonds." She grins.

links.title: Half Light: "Damn this. Make her answer."
links.text: Damn this. Make her answer.

links.title: You: ""Are you making fun of me right now..."
links.text: "Are you making fun of me right now? You better start complying."

links.title: Paledriver: ""I would never make fun of a real l..."
links.text: "I would never make fun of a real lawman, *xerife*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ma'am, you're not responsible for..."
links.text: "Ma'am, you're not responsible for what the client puts in your lorry as long as the seals are not opened. We officers know that." He gives you a stern look.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Lay off her."
links.text: Lay off her.

links.title: You: ""I didn't ask you about diamonds, d..."
links.text: "I didn't ask you about diamonds, did I? I don't care about that."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Diamonds are good for you, lawman...."
links.text: "Diamonds are good for you, lawman. You should try them sometime. Make yourself pretty like Eva Deshoras."

links.title: You: ""If you had to guess, who do you th..."
links.text: "If you had to guess, who do you think is smuggling drugs around here?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Easy. It's the skinny man who thin..."
links.text: "Easy. It's the skinny man who thinks he's a poet -- never trust a poet..." She squints across the square. "Also, he's the only one I can see from here."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "That's correct. There is no visibil..."
links.text: That's correct. There is no visibility of any of the others.

links.title: You: ""Okay. If you're not involved with..."
links.text: "Okay. If you're not involved with the drug trafficking then why are you still waiting here?" (Conclude.)

links.title: Paledriver: ""Where do you want me to go? This i..."
links.text: "Where do you want me to go? This isn't so bad. I can listen to music, or the seagulls. Look at all the colours and the features of this world. It's a good palate-cleanser, this jamboree..."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Or -- I can just relax and let my..."
links.text: "Or -- I can just relax and let my mind carry me back where it will. To the great plains..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think we're done here, no?" He c..."
links.text: "I think we're done here, no?" He closes his notebook to stress it.

links.title: You: ""I don't know, that's why I'm askin..."
links.text: "I don't know, that's why I'm asking you."

links.title: Paledriver: ""It's diamonds, lawman. Obviously."..."
links.text: "It's diamonds, lawman. Obviously." She grins.

links.title: You: ""How can you not know what you're h..."
links.text: "How can you not know what you're hauling in your own lorry?"

links.title: You: ""Fine. Let's change the subject.""
links.text: "Fine. Let's change the subject."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Good. I don't care about drugs. Li..."
links.text: "Good. I don't care about drugs. Little molecules. They're nothing." She glances wistfully at the photo.

links.title: You: ""I wanted to ask if you'd be intere..."
links.text: "I wanted to ask if you'd be interested in smuggling some drugs?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Why would I want to do that?""
links.text: "Why would I want to do that?"

links.title: You: ""For commerce, the lifeblood of the..."
links.text: "For commerce, the lifeblood of the isolas."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Lawman... what in the name of god..."
links.text: "Lawman... what in the name of god are you talking about?"

links.title: You: ""For the glory of the world republi..."
links.text: "For the glory of the world republic. Liberation of the spirit and body."

links.title: You: ""I don't know, the thrill of the cr..."
links.text: "I don't know, the thrill of the criminal lifestyle?"

links.title: You: ""That's not really what I was getti..."
links.text: "That's not really what I was getting at."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Then what *were* you getting at?""
links.text: "Then what *were* you getting at?"

links.title: Authority: "This line of questioning is going n..."
links.text: This line of questioning is going nowhere! Try harder!

links.title: You: ""Where could I get my hands on an *..."
links.text: "Where could I get my hands on an *experience* like that?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""If you don't know, pfft!" She flic..."
links.text: "If you don't know, pfft!" She flicks her wrist in a gesture of casual dismissal.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Alright. Let's get you a pale-categ..."
links.text: Alright. Let's get you a pale-category licence and roll that doobie up!

links.title: You: ""Okay. Let me ask you something els..."
links.text: "Okay. Let me ask you something else, then."

links.title: You: ""Thank you for now." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Thank you for now." [Leave.]

links.title: Paledriver: ""Yes -- go. Enough jamboree. I need..."
links.text: "Yes -- go. Enough jamboree. I need to get back to Mesque..." Her voice trails off.

dialogueTree.title: Paledriver: "The woman is still hunched over the..."
dialogueTree.text: The woman is still hunched over the railing, her head swaying to the music, her eyes looking at nothing in particular.

links.title: You: "Snap your fingers in front of her f..."
links.text: Snap your fingers in front of her face.

links.title: Paledriver: ""Huh?" That flicked a switch somewh..."
links.text: "Huh?" That flicked a switch somewhere. "What is it? What do you want?"

links.title: You: ""Never mind, sorry to bother you."..."
links.text: "Never mind, sorry to bother you." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Paledriver: "The woman still has her eyes fixed..."
dialogueTree.text: The woman still has her eyes fixed on the photograph in her hands. In the background, the radio plays.

links.title: You: ""Grandma?""
links.text: "Grandma?"

links.title: Paledriver: "Nothing. Her smile just keeps widen..."
links.text: Nothing. Her smile just keeps widening; her hair is grey like lead.

links.title: Half Light: "No. This one is a monster in disgui..."
links.text: No. This one is a monster in disguise.

links.title: You: "Snap your fingers in front of her f..."
links.text: Snap your fingers in front of her face.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you want her attention you may..."
links.text: "If you want her attention you may need to be more forceful."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wait..." The lieutenant stops you..."
links.text: "Wait..." The lieutenant stops you before you can snap.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She's just a distracted old woman...."
links.text: "She's just a distracted old woman. Better to leave her alone."

links.title: You: ""But Measurehead said she knows the..."
links.text: "But Measurehead said she knows the secret to turning back time."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant considers the slumpe..."
links.text: The lieutenant considers the slumped form for a moment. He sighs.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't understand why you're so s..."
links.text: "I don't understand why you're so set on what seems like a... *personal side-task*, but if you must, then let's get it over with..."

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why? I just told you why.""
links.text: "Why? I just told you why."

links.title: You: ""If you say so..." [Leave.]"
links.text: "If you say so..." [Leave.]

links.title: You: "Snap your fingers in front of her f..."
links.text: Snap your fingers in front of her face.

links.title: You: "Snap your fingers twice."
links.text: Snap your fingers twice.

links.title: Paledriver: ""Where am I? Who are you?" Like a m..."
links.text: "Where am I? Who are you?" Like a magician recalling a subject from hypnosis, you've jolted her back to reality.

links.title: Empathy: "The smile on her face has disappear..."
links.text: The smile on her face has disappeared, replaced by the wary aspect of a cornered beast.

links.title: You: ""I was actually hoping *you* could..."
links.text: "I was actually hoping *you* could tell me that."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Never mind," she sighs. "I remembe..."
links.text: "Never mind," she sighs. "I remember now. I'm still stuck in that traffic jam. In the *Fifties*," she adds with contempt.

links.title: You: ""Wait, what's so bad about the Fift..."
links.text: "Wait, what's so bad about the Fifties?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""The men have small jaws and everyt..."
links.text: "The men have small jaws and everything is made out of plastic. Why do you need plastic?" she scoffs. "When you can make the world out of amber?"

links.title: You: ""Where else would you be then?""
links.text: "Where else would you be then?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""Back in Mesque during the time of..."
links.text: "Back in Mesque during the time of the Revolution." The smile returns to her face. "The sidewalks and cafes are filled with young people... I was on my way to see a new boiadeiro picture starring Gabriel Buenguerro."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Until you came along, that is." Th..."
links.text: "Until you came along, that is." The look she gives you is accusatory.

links.title: You: ""Who's Gabriel Buenguerro?""
links.text: "Who's Gabriel Buenguerro?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""*This* is Gabriel Buenguerro..." S..."
links.text: "*This* is Gabriel Buenguerro..." She shows you the photograph in the lavish amber frame.

links.title: You: "Take a look."
links.text: Take a look.

links.title: Paledriver: "A strikingly handsome man looks str..."
links.text: A strikingly handsome man looks straight at you, his head crowned with a wide-brim hat. His hair is dark as an oil slick and his jaw is the most perfectly chiselled thing you've ever seen.

links.title: Suggestion: "This man's got a hold over her. Eve..."
links.text: This man's got a hold over her. Even fifty years later, you can feel it...

links.title: Paledriver: ""He was the biggest star of his day..."
links.text: "He was the biggest star of his day. Girls used to faint in the aisles of the cinema whenever he came on the screen, and school boys used to memorize all his lines..." She leans back, savouring the world she's conjured up.

links.title: Rhetoric: "In all likelihood, it's a world tha..."
links.text: In all likelihood, it's a world that's only ever existed in her mind.

links.title: You: ""So I take it you were in Mesque wh..."
links.text: "So I take it you were in Mesque when you were young?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""*Someone* was..." She nods as thou..."
links.text: "*Someone* was..." She nods as though her meaning were perfectly clear.

links.title: You: ""Someone? Are these not your memori..."
links.text: "Someone? Are these not your memories?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""They are someone's memories, boy."..."
links.text: "They are someone's memories, boy." She gets gruff, suddenly. "What difference does it make if it's me or not?"

links.title: Paledriver: ""They're beautiful. That is all tha..."
links.text: "They're beautiful. That is all that matters. Beautiful and true -- and they will win. They're *coming* for this, you know..." She looks around. "All of this."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "All of what -- the world? The prese..."
links.text: All of what -- the world? The present?

links.title: Empathy: "She seems to derive some bitter ple..."
links.text: She seems to derive some bitter pleasure from this strange thought. As if the past will one day wipe the present away, like a tidal wave approaching.

links.title: You: ""Sorry to interrupt your dreaming,..."
links.text: "Sorry to interrupt your dreaming, ma'am."

links.title: Paledriver: ""I wasn't dreaming. I was *there*,..."
links.text: "I wasn't dreaming. I was *there*, lawman. It was early spring and 'The Man Behind The Black Sun' had just come out. The posters were twenty metres tall. Everything was golden..." Her eyes narrow and she appears to take your measure.

links.title: Paledriver: ""While *you* people were tearing ea..."
links.text: "While *you* people were tearing each other apart over your petty little Revolution, in Mesque it was a golden age."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Republic of Mesque is a massive..."
links.text: The Republic of Mesque is a massive confederation on the isola of Mundi, the world's largest state by territory. It's a petrostate, a constitutional monarchy, and as of recently an outcast due to its tilt to the far right.

links.title: You: ""Right. I have some other questions..."
links.text: "Right. I have some other questions for you. Police questions." (Proceed.)

links.title: Paledriver: ""Why not, *xerife*? It's not like I..."
links.text: "Why not, *xerife*? It's not like I have anything better to do in this hellhole." She settles back against the railing of her motor lorry. Behind her, mountains of memorabilia, photos, and knicknacks line the dashboard.

links.title: Inland Empire: "There's something off about this wo..."
links.text: There's something off about this woman. Tell her to show you the soles of her boots. Maybe she was at the hanging... somehow?

links.title: You: ""*When* else would you be then?""
links.text: "*When* else would you be then?"

links.title: You: ""Are you alright, ma'am? You were o..."
links.text: "Are you alright, ma'am? You were out."

links.title: You: ""Me? I am the law around here.""
links.text: "Me? I am the law around here."

links.title: Paledriver: ""Then I don't suppose you could tel..."
links.text: "Then I don't suppose you could tell me where we are, lawman?"

links.title: You: ""Excuse me, ma'am, I'd like to ask..."
links.text: "Excuse me, ma'am, I'd like to ask some questions."

links.title: Paledriver: "No response. Wherever this woman is..."
links.text: No response. Wherever this woman is, your words fail to reach her.

links.title: You: ""Nothing to do here." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Nothing to do here." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Paledriver: "The small wrinkled woman does not g..."
dialogueTree.text: The small wrinkled woman does not greet you. She nods along to something on her radio. A photograph is clutched in her hands and there is a warm smile on her face.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The photo -- an *ambrotype* from th..."
links.text: The photo -- an *ambrotype* from the turn of the century. As golden as her smile.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's the warmth of a winter night's..."
links.text: It's the warmth of a winter night's fire. Maybe she could give you comfort and shelter? Some cigarettes and food money? Maybe she's your...
